about_the_game:
With Photo & Graphic Designer 15 you can transform your photos into real works of art and easily create vector graphics and illustrations

From snapshot to photo art

Whether you simply want to quickly edit your photo, or wish to create something completely new, Photo & Graphic Designer delivers the complete set of image editing tools.
[/list]

  • Adjust & crop photos
  • Experiment with colors and effects (brightness, contrast, saturation, shadows, highlights, temperature, levels, etc.)
  • Use 140+ photo filters via drag & drop
  • Photo heal tool: Easily retouch photos
  • Magnetic lasso: Cut out objects with ease
  • Magic Erase: Easily remove bothersome elements from a composition
  • Create collages with ready photo grids
  • Create automatic panoramas from up to 8 photos

Form and color for your vision

Vector-based drawings and professional design, create impressive compositions with Photo & Graphic Designer.
[/list]
  • Create vector shapes and texts
  • Blend layers with images, graphics and effects
  • Smart shapes (for timelines, diagrams, shapes like circles, stars, etc.)
  • Create art brushes from vectors and photos
  • 3D tools, set perspective, depth and shadow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista | 7 | 8 | 8.1 | 10
  • Processor: 700 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 600
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported formats Import: Bild: JPG, GIF, TIF, BMP, PSD, PDF, EPS, AI, XAR, WEB, XPE, CDR, CDT, CMX, DRW, SVG, EMF, WMF etc. Weitere: DOCX, HTM, HTML, RTF. Export: Bild: JPG, GIF, TIF, BMP, PNG, PSD, PDF, EPS, AI, XAR, WEB, XPE, CMX, DCX, SVG, EMF, WMF etc. Video: SWF, AVI, (animated) GIF. Weitere: DOCX, HTM, HTML, RTF

short_description: Reinvent reality. With Photo & Graphic Designer you have all the options for implementing your creative vision. Photo editing, graphics design and illustration — you'll find it all here, in one program.
